As a standard action, you conjure a cascade of volcanic ash to bull rush a creature within 30 feet of you. The CMB of this cascade is equal to your base attack bonus + your Charisma modifier + 4 from the cascadeâ€™s Gargantuan size. If the bull rush succeeds, the creature takes 1d6 points of fire damage per oracle level.

At 12th and at 17th level, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

You must be 7th level to select this revelation.
